ygData.subject: Re: Level 50 DARK ELF monk??
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I think certain classes can wear that mask....but they also work just like the Journeyman boots. =) Lanadina ... From: Jonathan
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I think certain classes can wear that mask....but they also work
just like the Journeyman boots. =)

Lanadina


----Original Message Follows----
From: "Jonathan" <jp1234@...>
Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Level 50 DARK ELF monk??
Date: Wed, 18 Aug 1999 14:07:02 -0400

From: "Jonathan" <jp1234@...>

It's not a worn item.. they're like jboots, you click on the mask in your
backpack or whatever and it changes you, you change back when you zone and I
also believe you can click it again to change back to your previous form but
not entirely certain.

-----Original Message-----
From: Dizzy J. <dizzyj@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 1:09 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Level 50 DARK ELF monk??


From: "Dizzy J." <dizzyj@...>

My understanding is that if you are wearing it, you can then walk into
evil areas (nek, grobb..etc) what about going back tino freeport (if your
good)?

can you keep it on, and go anywhere? (would be very cool)

On Wed, 18 Aug 1999, Lanadina the Magician wrote:

> From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>
> I sent you a private email with the info, so I don't spoil it for anyone
> else =)
>
> hugs,
>
> Lanadina
>
>

a
